src: Toza sikoyo na mpuku moko ya basanza 4 oyo eza te na diabete kasi ezalaki naino na diabete, ndenge abakisaki.
mt: 4 of the 5 people who were not diabetic before the study were diagnosed with diabetes at the end of the study.
ref: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

src: Monganga Ehud Ur, molakisi ya makambo ya kolongono ya nzoto na Université Dalhousie na Halifax, na Nouvelle-Écosse pe president ya etuluku ekipaka maladi mpe makambo ya siansi na lisanga ya bato ya diabete ya Canada, alobaki ete bolukiluki eza naino kaka na ebandeli.
mt: Dr. Ehud Ur, a professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and president of the Canadian Diabetes Association, says the study is a major step forward.
ref: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

src: Neti bato mosusu ya mayele, azondima te soki bakoki kobikisa diabte, alobi ete makambo wana oyo bamoni eza na ntina te mpona bato oyo basi bazwa diabete ya Lolenge 1.
mt: And other people with diabetes, if they are not treated, because the symptoms of the disease are not obvious to people who have type 1 diabetes.
ref: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

src: Na mokolo ya yambo, Sara Danius, sekretere ya lisanga ya mbano ya Nobel mpona kokoma na Eteyelo ya Suede, alobaki na miso ya bato na manaka moko ya radio na lisanga ya Radio ya Suede, azokoka te kosolola na Bob Dylan mbala moko mpona koyebisa ye ete alongi mbano ya Nobel ya kokoma ya 2016, mpe atiki kosala milende mpona koluka kosolola na ye.
mt: On Monday, Sara Danius, secretary of the Swedish Academy, announced that Bob Dylan had declined to accept the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, and that the academy would instead read his work aloud.
ref: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

src: Danius alobaki ete, "Sikoyo tozosala eloko moko te. Nabengi mpe natindi mikanda na baninga na ye ya makasi mpe nazwi biyano ya malamu mpenza. Sikoyo, ekoki mpenza.
mt: "I don't know what happened. I was just driving and then I saw the fire. I was scared and I was crying. I don't know what happened."
ref: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

src: Na kala, PDG ya Ring, Jamie Siminoff, alobaki ete kompani ebandaki ntango ngonga na ye ezalaki koyokana te longwa na magasin ya garage na ye.
mt: Finally, Ring CEO Jamie Siminoff announced that the company is no longer selling its garage door opener on its website.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.

src: Alobaki ete, asalaki eloko esalaka makelele ya WiFi.
mt: It is believed that the explosion was caused by a faulty WiFi router.
ref: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.

src: Siminoff alobaki ete batekaki mingi nsima ya kobima na ye na 2013 na filme moko ya Shark Tank esika ezolakisa bakolo na yango bazoboya kofuta mosolo po ebanda.
mt: 2013, Siminoff appeared on the television show Shark Tank, where he pitched his product to investors.
ref: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.

src: Na suka ya 2017, Siminoff amonanaki na chaîne ya televizio shopping QVC.
mt: 2017, Siminoff appeared on the shopping channel QVC.
ref: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.

src: Ring ekataki mpe likambo ya kosambisa na lisanga moko ya libateli, lisanga ADT.
mt: The ring is also used to measure the diameter of the bore of a gun barrel.
ref: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: Ata soki mangwele oyo baza na komeka ezomonana ete ezokitisa talo ya bato bazokufa na Ebola, kino sikoyo, kisi moto te emonisi ete ekoki kobikisa maladi oyo ezali.
mt: If a person who has been in contact with an Ebola patient dies, it does not mean that the disease has spread, the health ministry said.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

src: Etuluku moko ya biloko ya kobatela nzoto, ZMapp, emonanaki naino ete ekosalisa mingi ntango bamekaki yango, kasi bolukiluki emonisi ete ekosalisa mingi mpenza te na kokanga nzela na liwa ndenge bakanisaki.
mt: The experimental drug ZMapp, which was used to treat two American aid workers, has been shown to be effective in monkeys, but researchers say it is too early to know if it will work in humans.
ref: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

src: Na ntango ya komeka PALM, ZMapp esalisaki na kolandela, elimboli ete bato ya sinasi basalelaki yango lokola modele pe bakokanisaki bikisi misato mosusu.
mt: At the time of the PALM conference, ZMapp was in clinical trials, and the researchers were hopeful that it would be approved for use in humans.
ref: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: Lisanga USA Gymnastics ezopesa maboko na mokanda ya Komite olympique ya Etats-Unis pe bandimi ete libota ya Olympique esengeli kolendisa esika ya mosala ya libateli mpona bato na biso nyonso oyo bazosala lisano wana.
mt: USA Gymnastics has been suspended by the United States Olympic Committee for failing to report allegations of sexual abuse by a team doctor.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

src: Tondimi makambo oyo USOC elobi, emonisi ete matonda ya ba athlètes pe ya ba ekipe na biso, pe masano na bango, tokoki kokokisa yango malamu soki tosali mbongwana ebongi na ebongiseli na biso, kaka te kolongola ba certificat.
mt: The USOC has said that athletes and teams, and their sponsors, will be able to use the word "Olympic" in their marketing, as long as they don't use the Olympic rings or the Olympic logo, and don't claim to be endorsed by the IOC.
ref: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

src: Lisanga USA Gymnastics ezopesa makambo na ankete oyo ekoki kosalisa na ya koyeba malamu lolenge oyo koniokola wana oyo balimboli na molende nyonso na bato oyo Larry Nassar aniokolakai bango, elekaki kaka bongo kozanga koyebana banda kala pe eza na mbongwana nyonso ya ntina pe ebongi.
mt: USA Gymnastics has released a report on an investigation into allegations of misconduct by coaches and others against athletes, including those of Larry Nassar, who was sentenced to prison for child pornography and sexual abuse.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.

src: Lisanga USA Gymnastics mpe USOC baza na mokano moko: kolendisa masano ya gymnastique, mpe misusu, mpo ezala na libateli mpona bato bazosala yango mpona kokokisa bandoto na bisika ebongi, ya malamu mpe bango moko.
mt: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have agreed to a new contract: to provide a safe environment for athletes, among other things, to prevent sexual abuse and misconduct.
ref: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: Na mibu 1960, Brzezinski azalaki kosala mpona John F. Kennedy lokola mopesi-toli na ye, pe nsima asalaki na boyangeli ya Lyndon B. Johnson.
mt: 1960, Brzezinski was a member of the John F. Kennedy campaign, and later served in the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.

src: Na ntango ya kopona bato na 1976, apesaki toli na makambo etali boyokani na mikili ya bapaya, na nsima batiaki ye mopesi-toli mpona libateli ya mokili mobimba (NSA) banda 1977 kino 1981, azwaki esika ya Henry Kissinger.
mt: 1976, the NSA was caught spying on Kissinger's personal phone calls, and in 1977-1981, the NSA was caught spying on the personal phone calls of the U.S. Congress.
ref: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

src: Po aza NSA, asalisaki Carter na kolandela makambo ya politiki ya mokili, na ndakisa boyokani ya Camp David, na 1978; kobongisa boyokani kati na Amerika pe Chine na suka ya mibu 1970; kotomboka ya bato ya Iran, oyo esalaki ete bakanga bato na Iran na 1979; pe ndenge Union Sovietique ekotaki na Afghanistan na 1979.
mt: 1978: Carter and Begin negotiate the Camp David Accords; China and the United States establish diplomatic relations; the Iranian Revolution overthrows the Shah of Iran; the Soviet Union invades Afghanistan.
ref: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: Filme, oyo ezalaki kolakisa Ryan Gosling na Emma Stone, ezwi bambano na milongo nyonso ya minene.
mt: The film, starring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, was nominated for several awards.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.

src: Gosling na Stone baponaka bango lokola basani ya filme ya malamu ya mobali mpe ya mwasi.
mt: Gosling and Stone star in a critically acclaimed film about a young couple.
ref: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.

src: Mbano mosusu oyo bakopesa ezali filme, mosali, cinématographie, moto alatisaka basani, moto abongisaka bafilme, moto abongisaka miziki, moto abongisaka mosala, moto abongisaka makelele, moto asangisaka makelele mpe maloba oyo aleki.
mt: 1. assistant's assistant's assistant's assistant's assistant's assistant's
ref: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.

src: Banzembo mibale ya fileme wana, Audition (Bazoba oyo Balota) pe Engumba ya Minzoto, ezwaki mbango ya banzembo ya kala ya kitoko. Lionsgate studio ezwaki bambano 26 — mingi koleka ba studio nyonso mosusu.
mt: 20th Century Fox and Lionsgate have announced a bidding war for the rights to the film adaptation of the popular video game Audition (also known as Dance Dance Revolution). Lionsgate has offered $26 million, with other studios also bidding.
ref: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: Na Lomingo eleki, President ya Etats-Unis Donald Trump, na maloba oyo sekretere na ye alobaki, alobaki ete basoda ya Etats-Unis bakolongwa na Syrie.
mt: On Sunday, U.S. President Donald Trump, with his secretary of state, announced that U.S. troops would be leaving Syria.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.

src: Bapesaki liyebisi nsima wana Trump asololaki na telefone na president ya Turquie Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
mt: U.S. President Donald Trump spoke by phone with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
ref: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

src: Turquie ezalaki pe na mokumba ya kobatela basoda ya Etat islamique oyo bakangaki, ndenge balobi, mikili ya Eropa eboyi kozongisa bango na mboka na bango.
mt: Turkey is reportedly preparing to launch airstrikes against Islamic State militants, possibly in Europe, according to local media.
ref: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Yango endimisi kaka te ete badinosaure mosusu ezalaki na masala, likanisi oyo esi epanzana mingi, kasi ezopesa pe basango ya biloko ya kala ekoki kopesa te, na ndakisa langi pe ebongiseli ya biteni misato.
mt: This is because the dinosaurs were so large, they were unable to run fast enough to escape, and the climate was too hot for them to survive.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

src: . Bato ya siansi balobi ete masala ya nyama wana ezalaki motane makasi na likolo, se na yango ezalaki ya konzuluka to na langi mingi.
mt: The scientists say the cells are likely to be more resistant to radiation and other forms of damage.
ref: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.

src: Makambo bamoni esalisi mpe na koyeba ndenge mansala ya bandeke ekola.
mt: The accident is being investigated.
ref: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.

src: Mpo mapapu ya badinosaures ezalaka  na nzete ya makasi te, oyo babengaka mokuwa, kasi eza na biloko mosusu ya mapapu - nsala mpe bansala ya mike - bato basalaka bolukiluki balobi ete mbala mosusu mikuwa ezalaki bokoli ya mikilo ya biloko mosusu.
mt: Dinosaurs were not the only reptiles to walk the Earth, but they were the largest. Other reptiles, such as turtles and snakes, were much smaller.
ref: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

src: Lolenge masala ezali emonisi ete basalelaka yango te mpona kopumbwa kasi mpona makambo ya temperature to ndenge ezomonana. Bato basalaki bolukiluki bamonisi ete, atako eza mokili ya disonosaure ya elenge, elembo emonisi masala ya mokolo kasi te ya elenge.
mt: The study's authors say the findings suggest that dinosaurs may have been able to regulate their body temperature, but not their environment. They say that, if the dinosaurs had been able to regulate their environment, they would have been able to survive the mass extinction event.
ref: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Bato basalaki bolukiluki balobi ete, atako oyo eza mokila ya dinosaure ya elenge, ndakisa emonisi masala ya mokolo kasi ya mwana te.
mt: Researchers say the fossil of a dinosaur that lived 100 million years ago may have been a mother's lunch.
ref: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Motuka moko oyo ezalaki na bombi epanzanaki na biro ya bapolisi na Gaziantep, na Turquie, lobi na ntongo, ebomaki bapolisi mibale pe ezokisaki bato mosusu koleka tuku mibale.
mt: A car bomb exploded in front of a police station in Gaziantep, Turkey, killing at least 6 people and injuring others.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.

src: Biro ya guvernere elobi ete bato zomi ya libwa na kati ya bato bazoki bazali bapolisi.
mt: The government has said that the majority of the dead were police officers.
ref: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.

src: Polisi elobi ete bazokanisa ete Daesh (ISIL) nde moto abimisaki bitumba wana.
mt: Police say the Daesh (ISIL) group is responsible for the attack.
ref: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Bamonaki ete Sanza esalaka na kolanda mibeko ya ndenge moko na oyo ya minzoto mosusu: Bamonaki ete mosala ya minzoto nyonso na ebongiseli wana etambwisamaka na pole na bango, na kobaluka na bango, pe na eloko mosusu te.
mt: 1. The same day, the same time, in the same place: 1.1. The same day, the same time, in the same place, but with different people: 1.1.1. The same day, the same time, in the same place, but with different people, and different things.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.

src: Pole pe kobaluka, basalelaka yango elongo mpona koyeba motango ya minzoto Rossby, oyo eza na boyokani na plazma.
mt: In the wake of the storm, the Rossby vortex, which is a giant, rotating mass of plasma, was discovered.
ref: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.

src: Soki motango ya Rossby eza moke, mosala ya monzoto na oyo etali kobalusa magnetique mpe ekozala moke.
mt: If the Rossby wave is present, the jet stream and the associated weather systems will be located at the same latitude.
ref: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: Na mobembo na ye, Iwasaki akutanaki na mikakatano mbala mingi.
mt: In his statement, Iwasaki said he had been involved in many mergers.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.

src: Bapirate bayibaki ye, bambwa mabe babundisaki ye na Tibet, akimaki libala na Népal mpe bakangai ye na Inde.
mt: 2 pirates were killed, 1 was captured in Tibet, and 1 escaped to Nepal and 1 to India.
ref: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: Modele 802,11n esalaka na bafréquence nyonso mibale 2,4 Ghz pe 5,0 Ghz.
mt: 802.11n uses the same frequencies as 802.11b and 802.11g.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.

src: Ekosalisa yango mpe ekokana na ndenge ya nsima na 802,11a, 802,11b pe 802,11g, longola kaka soki esika station eza, eza na baradio mibale.
mt: 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g are the standards for the wireless network, and the device can connect to any station with a radio receiver.
ref: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.

src: Vitese ya 802,11n mbala mingi eza makasi koleka ya oyo ya kala po ezalaki na vitese ya ebele koleka ya 600Mbit/s.
mt: 802.11n is the latest standard, which can achieve speeds of up to 600 Mbit/s.
ref: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: Duva, oyo abala pe aza na bana mibale ya mikolo, azalaki te na bopusi makasi na Miller, oyo babetelaki ye lisolo yango.
mt: 2-year-old Duva, who was found with her 3-year-old sister, was not wearing a car seat and was killed by Miller, who was driving the car.
ref: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.

src: ntango basengaki ye aloba, Miller alobaki, "Mike azoloba mingi na ntango bazosambisa...nazalaki kobongama yango wana nazalaki koyoka mpenza te makambo azalaki koloba."
mt: "Mike was very upset about the situation...we were just trying to calm him down...we were trying to get him to relax," Miller said.
ref: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."

src: Tozosala makasi na kokitisa mingi ya dioxyde ya carbone oyo tozobimisa na eteni moko ya PIB na lolenge ya mingi kino na 2020 na kotalela ndenge ezalaki na 2005, wana maloba ya Hu.
mt: 2010 saw a record amount of carbon dioxide emissions, which increased by 2.2 percent from 2005 levels, according to the World Meteorological Organization.
ref: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.

src: Atyaki motango te mpona biloko bakataki, alobaki bakosala yango na kotalela nkita ya Chine.
mt: 2 people were killed, and 3 others were injured, according to Chinese state media.
ref: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

src: Alendisaki mikili ya bobola "na koboya kolanda nzela ya kala ya kobebisa naino mpe kopetola na nsima."
mt: "The attack was carried out by a group of armed men who arrived in a boat and landed on the island."
ref: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."

src: Alobaki ete "atako bongo, basengeli te kosenga bango na kozwa mikumba oyo eleki nivo, makoki, pe makasi na bango."
mt: "We are not going to give up our rights to our land, our water, our forests, our minerals and our resources."
ref: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."

src: Etuluku oyo ezoyekola makambo ya Irak ekopesa rapore na bango lelo na 12h00 GMT.
mt: 12:00 GMT is the deadline for the Iraqi government to respond to the report.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.

src: Ekebisi ete moto moko te akoki kondimisa ete likambo moko oyo ekosalema na Irak sikoyo ekosukisa bitumba ya bana-mboka, mobulu oyo ezokoma kaka mingi, to kokanga nzela po makambo ebeba mingi te.
mt: The report said the fire was caused by a fuel leak, but the cause of the fire is still under investigation.
ref: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

src: Rapore ebandi na kobondola mpo basolola na polele mpe basala boyokani na Etats-Unis mpona lolenge na yango ya kosalela bato ya Moyen-Orient makambo.
mt: The report comes as the U.S. is trying to broker a peace deal between Israel and the Palestinians.
ref: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.

src: Rapore elobeli mabe mingi na makambo nyonso oyo eza na mobeko wana ya kosalela mpona Irak mpe ezolendisa kosala mbongwana ya lombango.
mt: The report also notes that the U.S. has been involved in a number of other incidents in Iraq, including the bombing of a wedding party in 2004 and the killing of a family of five in 2007.
ref: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.

src: Likanisi ya liboso na kati ya makanisi na yango 78 eza ete miango ya sika ya politiki esengeli ezwaka liboso ya suka ya mbula oyo mpona kobatela bandelo ya Iraq na bato bazobundisa bango mpe kozongela masolo ya boyokani ya politiki na bamboka ya zingazinga.
mt: 78 members of the House and Senate have signed a letter to the president urging him to veto the bill, which would allow the U.S. to keep troops in Iraq indefinitely and would give the president the power to wage war against Iran.
ref: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: Senatere ya mwasi ya sikoyo pe mwasi ya president ya Argentina, Crisntina Fernandez de Kirchner, alobaki akozala candidat na maponi ya president lobi na pokwa na La Plata, engumba oyo eza pene ya bakilometele 50 (31 miles) na Buenos Aires.
mt: 50 km (31 miles) from Buenos Aires.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

src: Mme Kirchner ayebisaki makanisi na ye ya kopesa nkombo na maponi ya president ya Théâtre ya Argentine, esika moko wana oyo asalelaki mpona kobanda kampanie na ye Senat na 2005 lokola mosangani ya etuka ya Buenos Aires.
mt: Mrs Kirchner was seen in the company of her husband, the president of the Argentine Theatre, who was also campaigning for her in the 2005 Senate election in the province of Buenos Aires.
ref: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: Masolo wana ebimaki na ntembe oyo ezalaki mpona ndenge ya kosalela badepanse ya kosilisa bato mpe kotonga lisusu bandako nsima ya mopepe makasi Katrina; bato mosusu ya leta oyo batalelaka nkita ya leta ya makambo makasi babengaki yango na ndenge ya kosekisa "Boyokani ya Bush na Nouvelle-Orléans."
mt: 2005 Hurricane Katrina relief efforts were criticized by some for being slow to respond to the disaster, and the federal government's response was criticized by some as being too bureaucratic and slow to respond to the disaster, and the federal government's response was criticized by some as being too bureaucratic and slow to respond to the disaster, and the federal government's response was criticized by some as being too bureaucratic and slow to respond to the disaster, and the federal government's response was criticized by some as being too bureaucratic and slow to respond to the disaster, and the federal government's response was criticized by some as being too bureaucratic and slow to respond to the disaster, and the federal government's response was criticized by some as being too bureaucratic and slow to respond to the disaster, and the federal government's response was criticized by
ref: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

src: Kotonga ebengami liberale ya misala ya kotonga etiaki libeki na kofuta bakontra ya misala na bato ya Washington oyo bango bakanisaki.
mt: The liberal majority in the House of Representatives passed a bill that would allow the District of Columbia to vote in the Electoral College.
ref: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

src: Bato koleka bamilio minei bakendaki na Roma mpona matanga wana.
mt: 2 people were killed and 3 injured in a car accident in Rome.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.

src: motango ya bato oyo bazalaki wana ezalaki mingi mpenza yango wana likoki ezalaki te mpo bato nyonso bakota na matanga na esika ya Saint-Pierre.
mt: 12 people were injured, some seriously, in the explosion, which occurred at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and was felt in the town of Saint-Pierre.
ref: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.

src: Ba ecran ya batelevizio ebele ya minene, batiaki yango na bisika ndenge na ndenge na Roma mpona kosalisa bato na kotala molulu wana.
mt: A television screen is seen in a car in Rome as people are seen protesting against the government.
ref: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.

src: Na bingumba mingi mosusu ya Italie mpe na mikili mosusu, mingimingi na Pologne, basalaki bibongiseli ya ndenge moko, oyo bato mingi mpenza bamonaki yango.
mt: In many other countries, including Italy and Poland, the same day, the same event, was celebrated.
ref: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Bato ya istware balobeli mabe mayele ya FBI ya kotia likebi na makambo oyo eza pete na kobongisa, mingimingi mituka bayibi, na likanisi ya kotombola bolongi ya lisanga na bango.
mt: FBI agents raided a home in the area, seized computers, and arrested two men, one of whom was a former employee of the company.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.

src: Congres ebandi kopesa mosolo na makambo ya bosoto na mobu ya mosala 2005 pe elobaki ete FBI kotinda basali 10 po basala pornografi ya mikolo.
mt: 2005 Congress passed a law that required the FBI to report on the number of people arrested for child pornography.
ref: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: Robin Uthappa azwaki ba point eleki mingi na toure ya liboso, ba point 70 na ba ballon 41 pamba, ebetaki 11 quatre na 2 six.
mt: 70 points and 41 balls, 11 fours and 2 sixes.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.

src: Babeti ya katikati, Sachin Tendulkar na Rahul Dravid, babetaka malamu mpe basali boyokani ya bambala mokama.
mt: In the middle order, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, who have been the most successful batsmen in the history of the tournament, will be the key.
ref: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.

src: Kasi, nsima ya kozanga kolonga poto ya kapitene, Inde azwaki bapoint 36 pamba, balongaki te ba poto 7 mpona kosukisa lisano.
mt: 36 people were killed and 7 others were injured in the crash.
ref: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: President ya Etats-Unis George W. Bursh akomaki na Singapour na ntongo ya mokolo ya 16 sanza ya zomi na moko, mpona kobanda poso oyo akotambola na Asie.
mt: U.S. President George W. Bush is in Singapore for a two-day visit, his first to Asia since the 2004 presidential election.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.

src: Molandi ya premier ministre ya Singapour, Wong Kan Seng, ayambaki ye mpe asololaki makambo etali nkita mpe terorizme na Premier ministre ya Singapour Lee Hsien Loong.
mt: Singapore's Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong and his predecessor Goh Chok Tong have been warned by their security services to be on the alert for possible terrorist attacks.
ref: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

src: nsima ya mposo moko ya kokweya na maponi ya katikati, Bush ayebisaki bato ete azobanda kosala mombongo na Asie.
mt: In a speech to the Asia Society in New York, Bush said the U.S. would not tolerate nuclear weapons in the hands of terrorists.
ref: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: Premier ministre Stephen Harper andimaka kotinda 'mobeko ya kopetola' ya boyangeli na bato nyonso ya komite mpo batalela yango, liboso batanga yango mbala ya mibale, nsima ya likita ya miniti 25 ya mokolo ya mibale elongo na mokonzi ya NDP Jack Layton na biro ya premier ministre.
mt: Prime Minister Stephen Harper and his cabinet have been sworn in 'in secret' in a ceremony that was closed to the public, media and NDP leader Jack Layton and the prime minister's office.
ref: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

src: Layton asengaki babongola mobeko etali kobatela mopepe, asalaki yango na likita elongo na PM, asengeki "bakoma lisusu makambo nyonso banda ebandeli" ya mobeko etali kobatela mopepe.
mt: Layton said he would not be able to attend the meeting, as he was in a meeting with the Prime Minister, and said "we have other things to discuss" regarding the meeting.
ref: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.

src: Banda boyangeli ya federale emikotisaki mpona kopesa mosolo mpona lopitalo ya Mersey na Devonport, na Tasmanie, boyangeli ya leta na badepute mosusu ya federale balobaki mabe mpona mobeko wana, balobaki ete ekosukisa maponi ya federale oyo ekobanda liboso ya sanza ya zomi na moko.
mt: Federal police have been called to the Mersey and Devonport hospitals in Tasmania, after a federal government official and a senior federal official were found dead, apparently from a drug overdose.
ref: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

src: Kasi, premier ministre John Howard alobaki ete mobeko wana ezalaki kaka mpona kobatela bandako ya lopitalo mpo boyangeli ya Tasmanie ebebisa yango te, yango bapesaki mosolo mosusu 45 milio ya badolare.
mt: However, Prime Minister John Howard said the hospital would be ready by the end of the year, with the first patients arriving in the next few weeks.
ref: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

src: Na kolanda basango ya sika, ndenge bamoni nivo ya mai na mbu emonisi ete ebimisaki tsunami. Eza na mwa misala ya tsunami oyo bamoni pene ya Pago Pago mpe ya Niue.
mt: In a statement, the government said it was monitoring the situation and was ready to respond if a tsunami was confirmed. The last tsunami to hit the region was in 2009, when a magnitude 8.1 earthquake struck the Samoan islands.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.

src: Mbeba moko te esalemi pe moto moko te azoki na Tonga, kasi courant ekatanaki mpona ntango mokuse, yango esalaki ete bakonzi ya Tonga bazwi te makebisi etali tsunami wana oyo PTWC epesaki.
mt: No tsunami warning was issued for Tonga, but the current was reported to be strong enough to cause damage, according to the Pacific Tsunami Warning Center.
ref: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.

src: Biteyelo zomi na mieni ya Hawaï oyo eza na mbu to pene na yango, bakangaki yango na mokolo mobimba ya misato ata balongolaki makebisi.
mt: 12 people were killed and 30 injured in a fire at a Hawaii hotel, the cause of which is still unknown.
ref: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: President ya Etats-Unis George W. Bush asepelaki na liyebisi wana.
mt: U.S. President George W. Bush has been briefed.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.

src: Molobeli ya Bush, Gordon Johndroe, abengaki komipesa ya Corée ya nordi "etambe monene mpona kokokisa mokano ya kolongola mandoki ya nikleyere na esanga ya Corée."
mt: White House spokesman Gordon Johndroe said North Korea's "continued provocative actions make it clear that the international community must take action to stop the spread of nuclear weapons."
ref: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."

src: Mopepe ya zomi ya eleko oyo ya mipepe na Atlantique, mopepe ya se ya tropique Jerry, esalemaki na mbu ya Atlantique lelo.
mt: Tropical Storm Jerry is moving through the Atlantic Ocean, about 1,000 miles east of the Lesser Antilles.
ref: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.

src: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) elobi ete sikoyo Jerry eza likama ata moke te mpona mabele.
mt: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) said Jerry is expected to remain over water.
ref: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.

src: Lisangani ya ba Enginieur ya Etats-Unis bakanisi ete ba inches 6 ya mbula ekoki kobuka maziba oyo esi ebebaki liboso.
mt: 6 inches of snow is expected to fall in the area.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.

src: Ndako ya libwa, oyo mai ekotelaka yango kino na 20 feet na ntango ya mopepe makasi Katrina, eza sikoyo na mai kino na loketo po mwa libulu ya mai ya pene etondaki mpenza.
mt: 20 feet of water in New Orleans, the highest level since Hurricane Katrina, is the result of a levee breach.
ref: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.

src: Mai ezopanza na libulu oyo eza na eteni oyo mnene na yango eza 100 feet.
mt: 100 feet is about 30 meters.
ref: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Mokambi ya bacommunes Adam Cuerden amonisaki kanda na ye ndenge bazolongola bato ntango asololaka na Wikinews na sanza eleki.
mt: Adam Cuerden was identified as the person who took the photo and uploaded it to Wikinews.
ref: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.

src: Ye [Wales] akosaki biso banda na ebandeli. Liboso, asalaki neti ete eza mpona makambo etali mibeko. Ya mibale, ndenge amonisaki neti azoyoka biso, banda na mayele na ye ya koboma.
mt: Wales is a country in its own right. It is not a part of England. It has its own parliament. It has its own government. It has its own laws. It has its own flag. It has its own national anthem.
ref: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."

src: Kanda ya bato wana ememaki na milende ya sika ya kobimisa mobeko etali makambo ya kosangisa nzoto mpona site oyo eza na bamilo ya bavideo mpe bafoto.
mt: The video and photo show the plane's tail and wing, which were torn off in the crash.
ref: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

src: Mosala basalaki ezalaki mingi kaka na makanisi, kasi bakomaki programe mpo kolamusa makambo balobelaki mpona galaxie Sagittaire.
mt: The program is expected to produce a detailed map of the Sagittarius galaxy.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Makambo ekipe ezalaki koluka eutaki na bambonge ya makasi na kati ya galaxie ya moindo pe biloko ya moindo oyo ezalaki na La Voie lactée.
mt: The galaxy is located in the Milky Way.
ref: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.

src: Kaka ndenge sanza ebendaka mabele, esalaka ete ebimisa potopoto, ndenge moko la Voie lactée ebendaka galaxie Sagittaire.
ref: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Bato ya siansi balobaki ete eloko wana ya moindo eza na bopusi na eloko mosusu ya moindo kaka ndenge biloko mosusu esalaka.
mt: The researchers say the new device can detect a single molecule of a target substance in a sample containing billions of other molecules.
ref: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.

src: Likanisi wana elobaka ete biloko mingi ya moindo oyo eza zingazinga ya galaxie ezalaka zingazinga ya galaxie neti mwa halo moko, pe ezalaka na biloko ebele ya mikemike.
mt: The study found that many of the galaxies in the universe are similar to the Milky Way, and that they are also rich in dark matter.
ref: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: Barapore ya television emonisa milinga ya pete ezouta na izine.
mt: A television report showed the wreckage scattered across the runway.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.

src: Bakonzi ya mboka bakebisi bana-mboka oyo bafandaka pene ya izine na kofanda na kati ya ndako, na kokanga baventilateur mpe na komela te mai ya robinet.
mt: Local residents say the children were playing in the yard when they were hit by a falling ventilator and a broken water pipe.
ref: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

src: Na kotalela lisanga ya nikleyere ya Japon, bamonaki césium na iode ya radioactifs na izine.
mt: The Japanese government has announced that radioactive cesium and iodine have been detected in the country's drinking water.
ref: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

src: Bakonzi bakanisi ete ezolakisa ete bakontenere oyo ezalaki na uranium na esika wana, mbala mosusu epasuki pe ebandi kobima.
mt: Officials say the uranium was not in a form that could be used to make a nuclear weapon.
ref: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: Monganga Tony Moll amonaki ete tuberculose esilaka te ata moke soki omeli bakisi (XDR-TB) na etuka ya Afrika ya Sud ya KwaZulu-Natal.
mt: Dr Tony Moll said the disease was not yet widespread in South Africa, but was present in the KwaZulu-Natal province.
ref: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.

src: Na lisolo-mituna, alobaki lolenge ya sika "ezotungisa mingi mpe eza mpasi mpo ezoboma bato mingi mpenza."
mt: In the past, the chip "has been used to detect many things and has saved many lives."
ref: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."

src: Monganga Moll akanisi ete mbala mosusu, bato mosusu ya maladi bazwaki virisi wana na lopitalo, mpe mibale kati na bango bazalaki basali ya lopitalo.
mt: Dr. Moll said that most of the patients were children and that the hospital was full of them.
ref: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
